scripts.all: npm i && cd backend && npm run all
scripts.alldev: npm i && cd backend && npm run alldev
scripts.aleksi: concurrently "powershell -File gitpull.ps1" " npm i && npm run alldev"
scripts.newVersion: git pull && npm run build && cd backend && npm i && npm run tsc && pm2 delete all && pm2 start ecosystem.config.cjs && pm2 save
scripts.start: npm i && concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.docs: concurrently "cd backend && npm run docs " "cd frontend && npm run docs"
